commonPulls.name: Hart
commonPulls.description: Hart was dating Janga. Now she is dating Trig because Trig rich, Trig happy. Hart's heart of hearts Trig's heart of hearts.

commonPulls.name: Janga
commonPulls.description: Janga lives in a constant state of despair. He's sad because his best friend Trig stole his idea for a block stacking board game. Trig invented Jenga.

commonPulls.name: Trig
commonPulls.description: Trig invented Jenga. Trig sold Jenga. Trig rich. Trig happy.

commonPulls.name: Cent
commonPulls.description: Cent’s head might be bent, or it might be dent. Who bent or dent Cent’s head? It might be Hamer or Haned!

commonPulls.name: Hamer
commonPulls.description: Hamer couldn't've bent Cent’s head! He only knows how to dent!

commonPulls.name: Haned
commonPulls.description: Haned doesn’t know how to dent! But he might’ve bent Cent’s head…
